sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Preparing for the future and stabilizing financial aid to Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Those were among the priorities outlined in a joint press conference on Friday by EU chief Ursula von der Leyen and Belgian Prime Minister Alexander Ducroux, whose country took over the rotating EU Council presidency earlier this week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The European population looks at the European Union.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: They look at the European Union with clear expectations, with expectations to protect them, with expectations to strengthen our well-being, our welfare, and with expectations to prepare a common future.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: A common future here in Europe means also, of course, Ukraine in the heart of Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Belgium assumed the presidency of the European Council from Spain on the 1st of January.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Their position will rotate again on the 30th of June this year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Ukraine has unleashed more drones and missiles at Russian-occupied areas as part of its New Year offensive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Russian air defenses downed dozens of Ukrainian drones in occupied Crimea and southern Russia on Friday, officials said, as Kyiv pressed ahead with its strategy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy has pledged to strike more targets on the Crimean Peninsula and inside Russian border regions this year. The goal is to unsettle Russians as President Vladimir Putin seeks another six years in power in March's upcoming election. Russians hit Mirnurad in Donetsk with six S-300 missiles around midnight. The strike damaged private homes, public institutions and buildings on the mine's territory. According to the regional police, Russia also struck six settlements in the Donetsk region 24 times during the day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Israel's military confirmed on Friday that its air force fighter jets conducted strikes

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: on Hezbollah positions in neighboring Lebanon.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In a televised address from Lebanon, Hezbollah's leader said that the group had a historic opportunity to liberate every inch of Lebanese territory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, dozens of Palestinians took to the streets in the West Bank city of Ramallah to protest Israeli strikes on Gaza.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: They also called for revenge for Tuesday's killing of a senior Hamas leader in Beirut.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Salah al-Arawri headed Hamas' presence in the West Bank.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In Gaza, at least 13 people were killed when a missile struck a residential building in the Maghazi refugee camp.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The dead and injured were taken to the Al-Aqsa hospital in the nearby city of Dayar al-Bala.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Israel's air, ground and sea assault has killed well over 22,000 people so far.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Almost three months after the 7th October attack by Hamas, former hostages and NOVA survivors visited the site of the festival near Kibbutz Re'im.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: 364 civilians were killed in the attack and many more wounded.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: 40 hostages were estimated to have been taken during the attack on the festival.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: For my family and another 135 families, today is the 91st of October today is the night of 91 days that they are held by the terror organization Hamas and literally every second counts around 136 hostages are thought to remain in the coastal enclave following the 7th October attack.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: 100 hostages were released during a short-lived truce in fighting between Hamas and Israeli forces at the end of November.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: North Korea has fired more than 200 rounds of artillery shells into the sea, which landed near two

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: South Korean islands. Seoul called it an act of provocation and responded with live fire drills. Nearby areas were evacuated earlier that day. North Korea later said it was conducting drills in response to military actions by South Korea in recent days, referencing South Korea and the United States' first joint live fire drills of the year earlier this week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, North Korean leader Kim Jong-un has taken his daughter to visit a missile factory, according to reports by the North Korean broadcaster.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Kim Jong-un ordered his military to thoroughly annihilate South Korea and the United States if they initiate a military confrontation in the latest round of inflammatory rhetoric targeting Seoul and Washington.
